summary: A guide listing many great mods for making your Skyrim look great!
descriptionHtml:
Before I begin, I'd just like to say that I have been using mods since Skyrim came out and have a lot of experience choosing mods, installing mods, and solving CTDs. Over the years I have found a select few mods that work well for me. This is not to say that these are the BEST mods but I like them most. I am always learning about better mods each day. If you want to suggest anything just comment it and I'll look into it :)

This list is basically every mod I have ever used.

If you would like to see a smaller list of mods of mods that I am currently using (and is constantly updated as my load order changes) then you can find it [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90617]HERE[/url]

With each mod listed I will tell a bit of what it does. You can choose what you want!

[b][color=#00ffff]Alright so I am going to divide this into several categories for convenience and organization. I am a very organized person, don't like it messy.
I recommend that you set your NMM categories as follows:[/color][/b]
[list=1]
[*]animals and creatures
[*]armor and weapons
[*]modded outfits
[*]physics and animation
[*]weather, sky, and lighting
[*]water mods
[*]landscapes, dungeons, and cities
[*]clutter retextures
[*]bug fixes and performance
[*]character and NPCs
[*]followers and player homes
[*]miscellaneous mods
[*]gameplay changes
[*]grass, trees, and flora
[*]audio, voice, and fx
[/list]
[b][color=#00ffff]These 15 categories not only keep things organized, but help me to problem solve when something goes wrong.
Now I am sure you won't want to read this guide unless you are convinced it will look nice, so have a good look at the images section!
Looks good? Yes? Okay then let us proceed.[/color][/b]

[u][color=#00ff00][size=3]1 - Animals and Creatures:[/size][/color][/u]
[list=1]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57413/?]Animallica[/url] - adds lots of cool animals to Skyrim. I recommend choosing the lore edition... "A Møøse once bit my sister... No realli!"
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3621/?]Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack[/url] - re-texture of animals and creatures.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29631/?]Bellyaches HD Dragon Replacer Pack[/url] - re-texture of dragons.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20889/?]Bellyaches New Dragon Species[/url] - be warned, some of these things are a pain to fight in low level.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]Amidian Born Book of Silence Creatures[/url] - this is optional. Bellyache mods are my preferred re-texture.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66026/?]DRAUGR[/url] and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67871/?]SKELETON[/url] - textures by kajuan. These are very good quality. Did you know skeletons spelled backwards is snoteleks?
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1936/?]Better Atronach Textures[/url] - makes atronachs look a bit better. Gotta play cheap with style, right?
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8464415/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Rengel[/url] - Has some awesome atronach mods you should really check out!
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14950/?]Convenient Horses[/url] - Adds lots of customization for your horse, a horse whistle, horse armor, and more!
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54908/?]Skyrim Horses Renewal[/url] - Amazing horse textures, works with convenient horses. Not sure about the armor working tho..
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/37834630/?tb=mods&pUp=1]MihailMods[/url] - makes immersive creature and animal mods. Warning, these things butcher your low level characters.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79108/?]Wild Penguins of Skyrim[/url] - who does not want penguins, seriously?
[/list][u][color=#00ff00][size=3]2 - Armor and Weapons[/size][/color][/u]
[list=1]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75861/?]Book of UUNP[/url] - this mod adds a whole lot of variety to your vanilla armors. UUNP compatibility is a huge plus as well!
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]Immersive Armors[/url] - collection of many armors to add even more variety.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80167/?]Immersive Armors Refit[/url] - or - Skimpy Immersive Armors Mashup (from the site that shall not be named, google is your friend here).
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/?]Immersive Weapons[/url] - more weapon variety.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69784/?]Rustic Clothing[/url] - amazing textures. Comes in variety of texture sizes, 1k, 1k-2k, 2k, 2k-4k, 4k. 
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29167/?]aMidianBorn Textures for Immersive Armors[/url] - great textures.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42752/?]Seniors wear vanilla[/url] - no one wants to see a busty granny showing off her goods as she leans over the porch. NOT ME AT LEAST!
[*][url=http://robton.nu/vanilla-armors-and-clothes-tmb/]TMB Vanilla Armors and Clothes[/url] - or - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85411/?]UUNP Vanilla Outfits Bodyslides[/url] - changes mesh for better bodies.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url] - weapon and armor re-textures.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39870]LeanWolf's Better Shaped Weapons[/url]﻿ - thinner, more realistic weapon shapes.
[/list][color=#00ff00][size=3][u]3 - Modded Outfits[/u][/size][/color][b][color=#00ffff]
[/color][/b][list=1]
[*]Skyrim Scandal Blog - UUNP conversions
[*]EiHei Spot - lots of armors and outfits in different body shapes
[*]Skyrim Shitty UUNP - a blog with many UUNP Conversions
[*]Robton's website - Home of the TMB body. Many outfits and conversions for TMB. Conversions for UNPB and 7b bodies as well.
[*]Mitakusaner blog - website with many MANY armors and outfits covering many different body types. A lot of anime stuff, not my cup of tea.
[*]TES Mistel blog - cutesy outfits in UUNP. 
[/list][u][color=#00ff00][size=3]4 - Physics and Animations[/size][/color][/u]
[list=1]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url] - skeleton you need. Should not be overwritten unless you know what you're doing. Calcium helps to keep it strong.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62830/?]XPMSE Skeleton for RS Children[/url] - fixes the fps drop caused by RS Children.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extension[/url] - physics for armor, outfits, body parts, etc. (aka the mod that makes boobs bounce)
[*]HDT SMP - "Skinned Mesh Physics" - a work in progress. You can learn about it with a quick google search. I don't use it since it is difficult to use and has little support.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?]FNIS[/url] - lets you use animations from mods and what not.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53396/?]Sexy Idle Animation[/url] - or - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59048/?]Lifelike Idle Animations[/url] - good idle animations. I prefer Lifelike animation.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77343/?]Realistic Animation Project - Movement[/url] - or - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50078/?]Female Running and Walking Animation[/url] - good run/walk animation replacers.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56118]Pretty Jump Animations[/url]﻿ - I use style 2.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT High Heels[/url] - needed for some outfits.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15703/?]Pretty Combat Animations[/url]﻿ - need I say more? This replaces many of the combat idles and such. I like it a lot.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42656]Simple Sit Idle Animation[/url]﻿ - choose between 3 sitting idles for females.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16351]YY Anim Replacer - Zweihander[/url]﻿ - some combat animations.

[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33914]YY Anim Replacer - Mystic Knight[/url]﻿ - some combat animations.

[/list][u][color=#00ff00][size=3]5 - Weather, Water, Sky, and Lighting[/size][/color][/u]
[list=1]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced lights and FX[/url] - I prefer this combined with NLA. I have tried other setups, this works best for me. RLO is okay too.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52423]Pure Weather[/url]﻿ - pretty nice.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63478/?]True Storms[/url] - swish.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74048/]Ultra HD Transparent Snowflakes[/url]﻿ - for all of your snow flake needs.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27022/?]Supreme Storms[/url] - swoosh.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39450/?]Real Clouds[/url] - looks great in storms.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56279/]Ethereal Clouds[/url]﻿﻿ - another clouds mod.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59809/]Vivid Clouds and Fog[/url]﻿ - a nice fog/smoke replacer. I still use the clouds from Real Clouds.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42492/?]Realistic Sun[/url] - get the file for vanilla Skyrim.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24460/?]Supreme and Volumetric Fog[/url] - I do not use this anymore but it's a pretty cool mod. Can have some strange effects with certain ENBs.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/?]Imaginator[/url] - allows you to control many aspects of lighting in Skyrim such as contrast, tint, light intensity, bloom, etc. Very cool!
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49472/?]Realistic Nights[/url] - makes nights darker.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/?]ELE[/url]﻿ - Enhanced lighting for ENB. Kinda like a lighter version of ELFX. Use only this if you plan on using an ENB (Unless the ENB description asks you to install something like NLA or CoT).
[/list][list=1]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two[/url] - be sure to get the optional file for ENB textures. This water mod is very nice looking with ENBs, it's my favorite.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938/?]Watercolor for ENB and Realistic Water Two[/url] - for good colors in your water - sun scattering stuff. Gotta do some ini edits for this to work properly.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59547/?]Transparent Wave Spray Retexture[/url] - fixes the ugly gray shit you see all over waterfalls.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31686/?]Waves[/url] - for your beach immersion needs.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40564/?]Skyfalls and SkyMills[/url] - makes your distant waterfalls not look like malformed Play-Doh.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60576/?]Pure Waters - Waterfalls[/url] - good waterfall textures (realistic water two doesn't have any).
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?]Pure Waters[/url] - DO NOT get this if you are getting Realistic Water Two. I only list Pure Waters because some people like how its water flows correctly.
[/list][color=#00ff00][size=3][u]7 - Landscapes, Dungeons, and Cities[/u][/size][/color]
[list=1]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92009]Frankly HD Markarth[/url]﻿ - ﻿awesome markarth retex. Makes city more white and detailed.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37256]Superior Rock Textures[/url]﻿ - I use the 2k Dark Gray ones.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61995/?]Tamriel Reloaded HD[/url] - a great mod all around. This mod offers 1k, 2k and 4k versions, I use the 4k parallax for highest quality! Make sure you get the optional patch files (if you have those mods).
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67387/?]Northfire's Dungeons[/url] (Nordic Ruins and Caves) - wonderful textures for ruins.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39190/?]aMidianBorn Caves and Mines[/url] - best cave textures I have found.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45807/?]NobleSkyrimMod[/url] -  I use this mod for my furniture since Tamriel Reloaded doesn't cover that. Never use it for landscapes or roads.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29036/?]Real Snow[/url] - awesome snow.
[*][url=https://mega.nz/#F!j4ozDTAL!s8ntqkGe8_p5KzRWGmA6Kw]Better Dynamic Snow[/url] - use the TRF version. File name should be "SNOW" once downloaded.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1259340]LucidStorm1[/url]﻿ - makes excellent photo-realistic textures. Be sure to check those out!
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50316/?]Transparent and Refracting Icicles[/url] - don't stick your tongue on them!
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url] - Dragonborn DLC textures.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86430]Skyrim 2017 Terrain Parallax Textures[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49344/?]Vivid Landscapes All in One[/url]﻿ - this replace a LOT of landscape textures as well as some other things. Very good quality, 4k Parallax!
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63456/]ENB Terrain Parallax Fix[/url]﻿ - "ENB's terrain parallax without nasty overlay transitions on meshes".
[/list][color=#00ff00][size=3][u]8 - Clutter Retextures[/u][/size][/color]
[list=1]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35399/?]Book Covers[/url] - vanilla books are an eye sore.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91309]Rustic Noble Furniture[/url]﻿ - great clutter retexture
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75610]Ancient Dwemer Metal[/url]﻿ - retexture for Dwemer metal to make it less of an eye sore.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63766/?]Rustic Soul Gems[/url] - nice looking soul gems, not too flashy.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74345/?]Snazzy HD Furniture and Clutter[/url] - when I found out it added paintings, I was sold.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62665/?]Realistic HD Food[/url] - looking at this mod made me hungry. It's that good!
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62425/?]Embers HD[/url] - better looking embers for forges and fireplaces.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url] - more gore please.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29608?tab=files]Detailed Rugs[/url]﻿ - great rug textures!
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60412/?]Peltapalooza[/url] - Nicer looking pelts. They are really getting creative with these names.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50327/?]Ren's HD Shrines[/url] - Shrine texture overhaul. Praise Talos.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56588/?]Stunning Statues of Skyrim[/url] - Gives some much needed attention to statues' textures and meshes. Now I can stare at Dibella's boobs in 2k..
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62506/?]Rustic Clutter Collection[/url] - better looking clutter.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66185/?]HornCandles[/url] - just looking at these excellent candle textures gets me horny.. Should I stop with the awful puns? No, I think not!
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66819/?]MAPS[/url] - better texture for the maps on tables and such. What a creative name for the mod.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]SMIM[/url] - the mod you all know and love. Static Mesh Improvement Mod, does what it says!
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14227]Ruins Clutter Improved[/url]﻿ - like SMIM but for dungeons.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77541/?]Rustic Animated Potions and Poisons[/url] - better textures for potions and poisons with a bit of animation.
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1731/]Hectrol SpiderWebs[/url]﻿ - hd spider web retex
[/list][color=#00ff00][size=3][u]9 - Bug Fixes and Performance[/u][/size][/color]
[b][color=#00ffff][size=2]To improve performance with ENBs, try disabling ambient occlusion and depth of field.[/size][/color][/b]
[list=1]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64611/?]Insignificant Object Remover[/url] - removes little rocks, water plants, and ugly shrubs.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505/?]Skyrim Project Optimization[/url] - from what I understand, this mod doesn't render things you can't see which helps performance.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58666/?]One Mountain - To Rule Them All[/url] - only one mesh for mountains, boosts performance.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77791/?]No More Radial Blur[/url] - removes combat blur, boosts performance.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34981/?]No More Glowing Edges[/url] - removes glowing edges from magic effects.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79995/?]Whiterun Texture Memory Usage Reduction[/url] - lets you get better performance when you are in Whiterun. Pretty neat mod.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7901/?]No Menu and Loading Smoke[/url] - I do not want lung cancer.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72725/?]Crash Fixes[/url] - obviously fixes crashes.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85443/?]Load Game CTD Fix[/url] - same as above.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40706/?]One Tweak[/url] - if you have issues with your game crashing/freezing when you alt-tab out of Skyrim, this will help![/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85285/?]SKSE Barter Fix[/url] - fixes the issue where there was a set amount of gold that you could receive when selling goods to a merchant.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50305/?]SSME Skyrim Startup Memory Editor[/url] - self explanatory.[/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51038/?]SKSE ini pre-download for Lazy Users[/url] - I do not use this, but you can if you want![/size][/color]
[*][color=#efefef][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]USLEP Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url] - fixes Bethesda's mistakes.[/size][/color]
[/list][u][color=#00ff00][size=3]10 - Character and NPCs
[/size][/color][/u][color=#00ffff][b][size=2]If you have been tracking me as an author, you probably are well aware of the fact that I have a passion for making sexy characters so this part is very important for me :)
[/size]Hell, I even made a full guide JUST ON female characters. Check it out if you want >> [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87888/?]LINK[/url].[/b][/color]
[list=1]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide and Outfit Studio[/url] - [/size]
[*][size=2]Halo's High Poly Feet and Hands for UNP Bodies - [/size] Realistic looking hands and feet for females. One of Halo's mods. Use google.
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url] - My favorite eyebrow mod.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] - more eyebrow options. Again, a very creative name for this one.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88131]Unslaad Pale UNP[/url]﻿ - Very real looking skin. I use no freckle optional file as well. Note - this is only dds files so you need to let it overwrite another skin texture that has all of then needed maps & textures (i recommend letting this overwrite fair skin complexion).[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?]Demoniac[/url] - great skin textures, lots of options in installer, very good.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92062]Succulent Skin Texture[/url]﻿ - skin texture combination that I made.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] - great choice, very high quality, also one of the few with pink nips. Installer includes many options.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?]SkySight Skins[/url] - good lookin' male bodies.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards[/url] - better beards. Not much more to say.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72961/?]The Art of Beard[/url] - adds more facial hairs.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61937]Males of Skyrim[/url]﻿ - manly men.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36510/?]Superior Lore-Friendly Hair[/url] - better looking vanilla hairs.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82708/?]Shiva's Vanilla Hair Replacer[/url] - replaces vanilla hair with other hair mods.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88114/?]Kai's HDT Vanilla Male Hairstyles[/url] - gives the vanilla male hairs HDT physics.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88135/?]Kai's HDT Vanilla Female Hairstyles[/url] - gives the vanilla female hairs HDT physics.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88416/?]Yundao HDT Hair[/url] - great hair mod with wonderful HDT SMP physics. Also includes a cute little flower to stick in your hair![/size]
[*][size=2][color=#efefef][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos Renewal[/url] - my favorite hair mod. Unique, detailed hair styles. Many to choose from.[/color][/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]KS Hairdos HDT Physics[/url] - applies physics to some of the KS Hairdos. Be sure to get the BBP patch.[/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Apachi Sky Hair[/url] - many people like this mod, I don't. This adds a lot of hairs, but the quality isn't as good as KS Hairdos.[/size]
[*][size=2][color=#efefef][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/690/?]Freckles for Females[/url] - high quality facial freckles.[/color][/size]
[*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86208/?]Freckle Mania 2[/url] - face and full body freckles.[/size]

[color=#00ffff][b]Okay, now that we have gone through all the mods, let us discuss ENBs.
-=-
[/b][b]As I mentioned before, you can disable ambient occlusion and depth of field to improve performance.
-=-[/b]
[b]Here are a few ENBs that I recommend to you:[/b][/color]
[list=1]
[*][color=#efefef][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50501/?]The Grim and Somber ENBs[/url] - very good quality, many variations to try out! Azura is my favorite version.[/color]

[*][color=#efefef][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83548/?]Essentia[/url]﻿ - gives the game a very interesting look. Gloomy. High Contrast. Good detail and DoF.[/color]
[*][color=#efefef][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67483/?]Rampage[/url] - very realistic ENB. The screenshots do not do it any justice. Combine with NLA and ELFX for best result.[/color]

[*][color=#efefef][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87943]Legacy ENB[/url]﻿ - may require some tweaking to preference, but this ENB can be great for character screenshots and outdoor screenshots. My edited version of this has become my favorite ENB. Get my custom enb here: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90617]LINK[/url]﻿[/color]

[/url][/color][color=#ea9999]DO NOT USE LIGHTING AND WEATHER MODS UNLESS THE MOD AUTHOR SAYS YOU SHOULD!!! ELE (Enhanced Lights for ENB) IS THE ONLY ONE THAT IS GENERALLY SAFE TO USE.[/color]
[color=#00ff00]You may not notice a huge difference when using lighting and weather mods with your ENBs but if that ENB is based off of vanilla weather and lighting then it won't look as good as it should.[/color]
[color=#00ff00]Some ENBs even have their own weather and lighting systems.[/color]
